ISSUE.TITLE: Wireless display of the phone doesn't work
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hello ! I would like to use STF without plugging an USB cable on my device. It works perfectly when it is plugged but when I use "stf local --allow-remote --public-ip 192.168.43.1", the phone is detected but I get "WRN/util:datautil 7829 [*] Device database does not have a match for device "192.168.43.1:5555" (model "KC-S701"/"KC-S701")" warning message and I don't have the screen of my device on my browser: ![screenshot1](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/17450497/13317603/442cb6fa-dbb6-11e5-99ef-02cfd8104c0b.png) ![screenshot2](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/17450497/13317609/4c4cd202-dbb6-11e5-85ae-c0ebd279614a.png) Thank you for your help, Matthieu
